title: Three cheers for polar bears!
caption: Three cheers for polar bears!
desc: It’s International Polar Bear Day, created to raise awareness of the important role these alpha predators play in the Arctic ecosystem. Although polar bears aren’t endangered, their conservation status is considered ‘vulnerable’ and these magnificent beasts have become a sort of mascot for the race to stop the melting of Arctic sea ice. Arctic ice is crucial to the bears' survival, as they hunt the ringed seals that bob up through its holes. As the ice decreases, so does the hunting ground – which is bad news for our bears.
